DOC.brief_summary: In this study, the investigators varied the portion size of all meals served during two 5-day periods. During one period, baseline amounts of all foods and beverages were served, and during the other, the portion size of all items was increased by 50%. The primary aim of the study is to determine the effect of varying the portion size of foods and beverages served over 5 days on energy intake in preschool children.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Portion Size Over 5 Days in Preschool Children
DOC.criteria: Attending one of the designated daycare centers Food Allergies Food Restrictions Health Issues that Preclude Participation Not available for duration of the study
